articles.author: Madeline Holcombe, CNN
articles.title: We have to do something dramatic to protect the US against Covid-19, expert says - CNN
articles.description: With Covid-19 cases surging in 49 states as vaccination rates lag, turning the tide will require Americans to "do something dramatic to protect our country," an expert said.
articles.content:
(CNN)With Covid-19 cases surging in 49 states as vaccination rates lag, turning the tide will require Americans to "do something dramatic to protect our country," an expert said.

articles.description: Fully vaccinated Americans could soon be allowed into Canada for non-essential travel. Quebec's health minister is set to provide an update about the vaccination campaign. Here's what you need to know.
articles.content:
• Quebec reported 65 new cases of COVID-19 on Thursday and one new death that occurred before July 13.

articles.content:
